description: Shop pricing rules for buying and selling items based on shop type and charisma
notes: Formula for buying: price = base_value × (base_multiplier - (CHA - charisma_base) × charisma_rate)
Formula for selling: price = base_value × (base_multiplier + (CHA - charisma_base) × charisma_rate)
Specialty shops only buy items they stock; general stores buy anything
